article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZmAZOM hentry entry story-marquee-standard

h2.a: The Company That Fought To Make Paying Your Taxes Harder

div.p: Imagine filing your income taxes in five minutes — and for free. You'd open up a pre-filled return, see what the government thinks you owe, make any needed changes and be done. The miserable annual IRS shuffle, gone. So why hasn't it become a reality?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-WTBEY9 hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Why You Should Get Up Early

div.p: The case for starting your day in the dark.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YyTzqs hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: What It's Like Being The First Game Developer In Your Entire Country

div.p: Leti Games is the only game studio in Ghana. “We are on the verge of creating not just a game company, but an entire industry,” says a founder.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YChC52 hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Hipsters Panic When Confronted With A Guy Fieri Restaurant In Brooklyn

div.p: Trendy Brooklynites love to grab an ironic dining experience at Guy Fieri’s restaurant in Times Square, but what would they think if Guy made plans to open a branch in their neighborhood?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-14pCOPC hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Why Do Cicadas Spend So Much Time Underground?

div.p: Seventeen years is a long time to hang out underground. It’s long enough for Bill Pullman to go from an awesome fictional president to an awful one. Why do cicadas spend so much time out of sight and out of mind?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10G7hFN hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: 10 Movies We Can't Believe Have Merchandise Tie-Ins

div.p: When "Being John Malkovich" was released in a limited-edition VHS collector’s set (yep, they used to do that), Polygram USA Video was looking for something special to lure consumers to the package.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-15QHutW hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Designers Cram Entire Hotel Room Into A Suitcase

div.p: A portable hotel room design packs down into a trunk, and then pops up into a sleeping area and work space.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11C8Sv6 hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Hackers Create An Amazing, Illegal Portrait Of The Internet

div.p: Someone hacked almost half a million devices around the world. Why? They wanted to see what the Internet looked like.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-X9k58P hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Jane Goodall's Junk Science

div.p: Last week famed primatologist Jane Goodall was found to have plagiarized parts of her new book, but a deeper look reveals a work plagued by rampant copying, obvious errors, and ominous junk science.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11Ih693 hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: What It's LIke To Have Gay Parents

div.p: People often asked me, "Do you think not having a father changed you?”

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-14lyKj8 hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Bald Eagle Cam Gives Birds-Eye View Of Hatching Eggs

div.p: A bald eagle live cam on California's Catalina Island is streaming live footage of two majestic eagles keeping watch over a trio of precious eggs expected to hatch around March 31.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-104MNEt hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: The Life And Death Of The Hacker Who Was Supposed To Be The Next Mark Zuckerberg

div.p: Ilya Zhitomirskiy was supposed to be the next Mark Zuckerberg. And then everything fell apart.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZQvepZ hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: How To Steal Soda From A Vending Machine With A Measuring Tape

div.p: The title says it all.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-WUfZyV hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Drunk Man Buys Enormous Snake, Which Tries To Eat His Friend

div.p: Never drink and drive. Also, never drink and purchase a potentially deadly animal.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-14rnVwg hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Has The Met Museum Been Cheating On Admission Prices?

div.p: The Met asks you to pay a “recommended” admissions fee of $25 USD. Just what that “recommended” really means is at the heart of a class action lawsuit coming before New York this month prompting the question: are all “admission” fees a form of cheating?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YyvO1u hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Are Temporary Tattoos Safe?

div.p: Thinking about getting a temporary tattoo over spring break, just for fun? Think twice, warns the FDA.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZTY9w1 hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: How To Make Your Own Dishwasher Detergent

div.p: Recently, I set my sights on making something so unnatural, most people have never thought about what it’s made of: dishwasher detergent.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Zrpaaf hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Every Woody Allen Stammer From Every Woody Allen Movie

div.p: Here is every Woody Allen stammer ever from every Woody Allen movie ever. Brace yourselves.....

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YRkEy9 hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: The Perfect Life Of Hugh Hefner

div.p: A look at Hugh Hefner's life at the Playboy Mansion.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZpZsml hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Having Herpes Is Even Worse Than You Thought

div.p: A study in the journal "Neurology" brings the surprising news that having herpes could be even worse than you think it is.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YRoxmZ hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Why Are TV Remotes So Terrible?

div.p: If you go to someone's house and pick up the TV remote, chances are, you won't know how it works. This shouldn't be the case in the 21st century.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-16f8LbM hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: YOU LOOK GREAT IN GREEN SCREEN

h2.a: The Future Of Fitting Rooms Is All Virtual And Kinda Weird

div.p: It turns out that there's a way to shop and try on clothes without stepping foot into a dressing room.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YxUxDd hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: This Pizza Cost $750,000

div.p: This is the story of the fallout from the first real world bitcoin transaction.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10KpF0l hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: WHEN YOU'RE TOO LAZY TO COMPARISON SHOP

h2.a: How Much Does An iPhone Really Cost?

div.p: Apple releases a new iPhone every year, but this past year was the first time in the US that the phone was available on three of the four major carriers at launch. If you live in an area where no one carrier is obviously better than the other and your contract is up, you’re left to choose which is the right choice.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZTZXFd hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Store Charges $5 'Just Looking' Fee

div.p: A fairly new term, showrooming describes shoppers that examine a product in-store before looking online to find the same item cheaper.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YCarcT hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: The Story Of The $338 Million Powerball Beer Run Will Warm Your Heart

div.p: This Tuesday is stressful — what with the Supreme Court tension and North Korea wanting to meet us at the flagpole at 3 p.m. So you should probably meet Pedro Quezada, the immigrant father from New Jersey who just won the $338.3 million lotto jackpot.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZprDSr hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: White House Can't Afford Its Shapeshifting Alien Reptile Guards

div.p: A shapeshifting reptile from outer space guards President Obama, according to a new conspiracy video.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-WSHgSi hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: North Korea Orders Artillery To Be Combat Ready, Targets U.S. Bases

div.p: North Korea said on Tuesday its strategic rocket and long-range artillery units have been ordered to be combat ready, targeting U.S. military bases on Guam, Hawaii and mainland America after U.S. bombers flew sorties threatening the North.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-14scFzP hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: My Gucci Addiction

div.p: "In the past few years, I've bought eighty-one leather jackets. Dozens of boots and leather gloves. I've purchased pants that cost $5,000. I own a $22,000 coat... My name is Buzz Bissinger. I am 58 years old, the best-selling author of 'Friday Night Lights,' father of three, husband. And I am a shopaholic."

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-14rR0rB hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: THIS IS HOW EVERYONE SHOULD PARK

h2.a: Two Guys Powerslide Their Way To New World Records For 'Tightest Parallel Parking Job'

div.p: These guys are way better at parking than you are.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-102GktN hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: The FBI's Most Popular Declassified Memo

div.p: Over the past two years, this file has been viewed nearly a million times. Yet, it is only a single page, relaying an unconfirmed report that the FBI never even followed up on.
